subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous forts in Rajasthan were built during the Mewar dynasty?
question_hi: राजस्थान में मीवार संघीय उत्तरों के लिए कौन से जालें एकमात्र हैं ?
explanation_en: Kumbhalgarh and Mehrangarh are famous forts in Rajasthan that were built during the Mewar dynasty. Kumbhalgarh Fort was built by Rana Kumbha to protect his kingdom from external threats, while Mehrangarh Fort was built by Rana Ratan Singh I.

explanation_en: The correct answer is B as Kumbhalgarh and Chittor Garh Forts were built during the Mewar dynasty.
